title: NCP反作弊报错
author: qwe1664828807
txt_content:
NCP插件一直报错怎么办？？后台很乱 一秒一次
[12:20:55 错误] [NoCheatPlus] Off primary thread call to hasByPass for INVENTORY_OPEN See earlier in this log, search for -> log once id=-1183375959

replies.author: Hanssc
replies.txt_content:
方法1:更新到最新版的ncp看看还会不会报错(从构建服务器上下载，不是bukkit/spigotmc上)
方法2:在config中关闭所以和inventory有关的检查，然后再试一试。
